thread.section_title: LaserAway Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LaserAway | www.laseraway.com
thread.title: RSGjr

author: RSGjr
title: RSGjr
text: LaserAway is the leader for the cosmetic / medi-spa industry. All of their locations are beautifully designed from their common areas to their treatment rooms. Their professionalism is paramount which is evidenced by how knowledgeable their non-clinical staff are about their services / treatments and their clinicians are well-trained with the healthcare industries best practices for clinical excellence. I go to LaserAway for their most basic service to the more innovative and cutting-edge FDA approved treatments. Hands down, LaserAway is the B-E-S-T!
